openmeteo_weather.error: Module openmeteo_requests not installed in venv

weather_context.conditions: Cold and humid, foggy days common
weather_context.recommendations: Indoor attractions preferred due to cold, humid, foggy weather. Outdoor activities best for midday hours (warmest).

attractions.name: Hongyadong Folk Custom Scene Area
attractions.description: Famous stilt house complex built into cliffside overlooking Jialing River, known for stunning nighttime illumination
attractions.weather_suitability: Moderate - partially covered walkways, but outdoor viewing areas
attractions.notes: Free admission. Best visited at night for illuminated views. Can be crowded during Chinese New Year (Feb 17, 2026). Indoor shopping and dining available.

attractions.name: Three Natural Bridges
attractions.description: UNESCO World Heritage Site featuring three massive natural stone arch bridges in karst landscape
attractions.weather_suitability: Low in February - outdoor walking required, cold and potentially foggy
attractions.notes: Located ~3 hours from downtown Chongqing. Requires advance booking. Not recommended for February due to cold weather and limited visibility from fog. Consider visiting indoor attractions instead during winter.

attractions.name: Three Gorges Museum
attractions.location: 236 Renmin Rd, Daxigou, Yuzhong District, Chongqing
attractions.description: Major museum showcasing Three Gorges history, culture, and Chongqing's development with extensive exhibits
attractions.weather_suitability: Excellent - fully indoor attraction, ideal for cold/rainy February days
attractions.notes: Free admission with ID. Closed Mondays. English audio guides available. Perfect for foggy or rainy weather days in February.

attractions.name: Ciqikou Ancient Town
attractions.description: 1000-year-old ancient town with traditional architecture, street food, tea houses, and local crafts
attractions.weather_suitability: Moderate - outdoor walking streets with some covered areas and indoor shops/restaurants
attractions.notes: Free admission. Try local snacks (mahua twisted dough sticks). Can be very crowded on weekends and holidays. Some indoor tea houses provide warm refuge from cold weather.

attractions.name: Chongqing Chaotianmen Square
attractions.description: Historic port area at confluence of Yangtze and Jialing Rivers, now modern plaza with river cruise terminals
attractions.weather_suitability: Low - fully outdoor, windy, cold in February
attractions.notes: Free admission. River cruise departures available (separate ticket required). Not recommended for February due to cold winds from river. Brief visit only if weather permits.

attractions.name: Eling Park
attractions.description: Hilltop park offering panoramic views of Chongqing cityscape, with observation tower
attractions.weather_suitability: Very low in February - outdoor park, foggy conditions common, limited visibility
attractions.notes: Free admission. Observation tower costs extra (~$3 USD). February fog severely limits panoramic views. Skip if weather is overcast.

top_3_for_february.name: Three Gorges Museum
top_3_for_february.reason: Fully indoor, educational, free admission, perfect for cold/foggy February weather

top_3_for_february.name: Hongyadong Folk Custom Scene Area
top_3_for_february.reason: Iconic attraction with indoor/outdoor mix, stunning night views, cultural significance

top_3_for_february.name: Ciqikou Ancient Town
top_3_for_february.reason: Traditional architecture, street food, mix of indoor/outdoor spaces, cultural immersion

february_specific_advice: Prioritize indoor attractions due to cold (7-20°C), humid, and foggy conditions
Visit outdoor attractions during warmest hours (11 AM - 2 PM)
Pack warm, waterproof jacket for outdoor walking
Chinese New Year (Feb 17, 2026) means festive decorations but also larger crowds
Limited sunshine (33 hours/month) makes photography challenging at outdoor scenic spots
Natural attractions like Three Natural Bridges better visited in warmer months (April-October)

notes: Test completed with mixed skill availability. Gaode Maps API failed (connection issue), RedNote MCP not configured, OpenMeteo weather module missing. Successfully used Google Maps for POI data and web search for weather context. In production, ensure all MCP servers are properly configured and Python dependencies installed.
